adding_account:
‚ûï Adding account `'{account_name}'`.

Please enter your **API ID**:
prompt_api_hash: Great. Now, please enter your **API Hash**:
prompt_2fa: Ô∏èüîê This account is protected by Two-Factor Authentication. Please enter your password (2FA):
prompt_lang: Choose a language for this account (e.g., `ru` or `en`):
prompt_device: Do you want to set a custom device? If not, a random one will be generated. (yes/no):
verifying_creds: üîé Verifying credentials and checking for duplicates...
err_duplicate_session: ‚ùå Error: An account with Telegram ID `{user_id}` already exists in the database as `'{existing_name}'`.
add_acc_success: ‚úÖ Account `'{account_name}'` was successfully added. It will be started on the next bot restart if activated.
add_acc_fail: ‚ùå Failed to add account `'{account_name}'`. The name might already exist.
add_acc_timeout: Timeout reached. Account creation process cancelled.
confirm_delete:
Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è Are you sure you want to **PERMANENTLY** delete the account `'{account_name}'` and all related data (session, modules)?

Send `yes` to confirm.
delete_success: ‚úÖ Account `'{account_name}'` has been deleted. Changes will take effect after a restart.
delete_fail: ‚ùå Could not find account `'{account_name}'` to delete.
toggle_enabled: üü¢ Account `'{account_name}'` is now **enabled**. It will start after a restart.
toggle_disabled: üî¥ Account `'{account_name}'` is now **disabled**. It will stop after a restart.
lang_updated: ‚úÖ Language for the account has been updated to `{lang_code}`.
